name: Swat Team
description:
Swat Team is about bugs and the swatters who swat them. Tensions run high in the "Buge House" where gnats are running rampant, and berries grow wildly in any crevice the house can offer. In this mess of a home we place you (and a friend) to do your duty: duking it out amongst yourselves for Master Buge's entertainment.
